verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David יַֽעַנְךָ֣ <S%H6030><s%> hear יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee in the day צָרָ֑ה <S%H6869><s%> of trouble יְ֝שַׂגֶּבְךָ֗ <S%H7682><s%> defend שֵׁ֤ם ׀ <S%H8034><s%> the name אֱלֹהֵ֬י <S%H430><s%> of the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob
יִשְׁלַֽח־ <S%H7971><s%> Send עֶזְרְךָ֥ <S%H5828><s%> thee help מִקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> from the sanctuary וּ֝מִצִּיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> thee out of Zion יִסְעָדֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H5582><s%> and strengthen

יִזְכֹּ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> Remember כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִנְחֹתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4503><s%> all thy offerings וְעוֹלָתְךָ֖ <S%H5930><s%> thy burnt sacrifice יְדַשְּׁנֶ֣ה <S%H1878><s%> and accept סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah
יִֽתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> Grant לְךָ֥ כִלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> thee according to thine own heart וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲצָתְךָ֥ <S%H6098><s%> all thy counsel יְמַלֵּֽא׃ <S%H4390><s%> and fulfil

נְרַנְּנָ֤ה ׀ <S%H7442><s%> We will rejoice בִּ֘ישׁ֤וּעָתֶ֗ךָ <S%H3444><s%> in thy salvation וּבְשֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> and in the name אֱלֹהֵ֥ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God נִדְגֹּ֑ל <S%H1713><s%> we will set up [our] banners יְמַלֵּ֥א <S%H4390><s%> fulfil יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁאֲלוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4862><s%> all thy petitions

עַתָּ֤ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יָדַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> Now know כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הוֹשִׁ֥יעַ ׀ <S%H3467><s%> saveth יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> I that the LORD מְשִׁ֫יח֥וֹ <S%H4899><s%> his anointed יַ֭עֲנֵהוּ <S%H6030><s%> he will hear מִשְּׁמֵ֣י <S%H8064><s%> heaven קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> him from his holy בִּ֝גְבֻר֗וֹת <S%H1369><s%> strength יֵ֣שַׁע <S%H3468><s%> with the saving יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <S%H3225><s%> of his right hand

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> Some בָ֭רֶכֶב <S%H7393><s%> Some [trust] in chariots וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> and some בַסּוּסִ֑ים <S%H5483><s%> and some in horses וַאֲנַ֓חְנוּ ׀ <S%H587><s%> we בְּשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God נַזְכִּֽיר׃ <S%H2142><s%> but we will remember

הֵ֭מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They כָּרְע֣וּ <S%H3766><s%> They are brought down וְנָפָ֑לוּ <S%H5307><s%> and fallen וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we קַּ֝֗מְנוּ <S%H6965><s%> but we are risen וַנִּתְעוֹדָֽד׃ <S%H5749><s%> and stand upright
יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD הוֹשִׁ֑יעָה <S%H3467><s%> Save הַ֝מֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> let the king יַעֲנֵ֥נוּ <S%H6030><s%> hear בְיוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> us when קָרְאֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H7121><s%> we call
